recite.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to say a poem, piece of literature etc that you have learned, for people to listen to
recite.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She recited a poem that she had learnt at school.
recite.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to tell someone a series or list of things
recite.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Len recited the breakfast menu â€“ cereal, bacon and eggs, and toast.
